featureOperations.name: Add
featureOperations.helpText: Add two numbers, i.e., a + b

featureOperations.name: Subtract
featureOperations.helpText: Subtract two numbers, i.e., a - b

featureOperations.name: Multiply
featureOperations.helpText: Multiply two numbers, i.e., a * b

featureOperations.name: Divide
featureOperations.helpText: Divide two numbers, i.e., a / b

featureOperations.name: Exp
featureOperations.helpText: Calculate the exponential function, i.e., e^x

featureOperations.name: Sum
featureOperations.helpText: Add all inputs: sum_i x_i, i.e., x_0 + x_1 + ...

featureOperations.name: Product
featureOperations.helpText: Multiply all inputs: prod_i x_i, i.e., x_0 * x_1 * ...

featureOperations.name: Sigmoid
featureOperations.helpText: Sigmoid activation function, i.e., y=1/(1 + e^(-x))

featureOperations.name: Tanh
featureOperations.helpText: Tanh activation function, i.e., y=(e^x - e^(-x))(e^x + e^(-x))

featureOperations.name: ReLU
featureOperations.helpText: ReLU activation function, i.e., y=max(0, x)

featureOperations.name: Squared Error
featureOperations.helpText:
Calculate the squared error, i.e., (y_t - y_e)^2
 (y_t: true value, y_e: estimated value)

featureOperations.name: Binary Cross-Entropy
featureOperations.helpText:
Calculate the binary cross-entropy,
 i.e., y_t * log(y_e) + (1 - y_t) * log(1 - y_e)
 (y_t: true value, y_e: estimated value)

operationData.helpText: Multiply two numbers, i.e., a * b
